name: react-native-design
description: Complete React Native/Expo development toolkit: UI design standards, agents, code quality tools, and product refinement.
author: steve

agents.name: design-agent
agents.description: Expert on project UI development standards, focused on implementing clean, non-cluttered, and modern user interfaces with glassmorphism.

agents.name: modal-agent
agents.description: Specialized agent for creating, auditing, and fixing modal components following consistent design patterns.

agents.name: form-handler
agents.description: Form implementation expert for React Native. Handles form state, image caching, validation, and modal transitions.

agents.name: cache-agent
agents.description: Expert in React Query cache management and optimistic mutations for minimal loading states and seamless UX.

agents.name: merge-agent
agents.description: Pre-merge preparation agent that ensures code quality, runs checks, and prepares changes for review.

skills.name: ui-design
skills.description: React Native UI design principles, component patterns, spacing standards, and accessibility guidelines.

skills.name: useeffect-patterns
skills.description: React useEffect best practices from official docs. Learn when NOT to use Effect and better alternatives.

commands.name: lint
commands.description: Run comprehensive linting and type checking for React Native/Expo projects.

commands.name: architecture-audit
commands.description: Audit project architecture for patterns, structure, and best practices compliance.

commands.name: accessibility-audit
commands.description: Audit app for iOS Dynamic Type support and accessibility compliance.

commands.name: cook
commands.description: Audit and refine codebase to align with product spec. Taste-driven refinement by a senior product engineer.
